attributes.action: Force Southern Rail (Govia) to reduce ticket prices for reduced service.
attributes.background: Southern Rail (Govia) have inflicted a very low quality service to passengers this year, with regular cancelled trains, misleading, incomplete or absent information, delays and severe overcrowding. They have now cut 350 services a day from July 11th 2016. They should  be made to cut their fares.

rejection.details: Train fares are a commercial decision for Govia Southern Rail, not a decision for the Government. We have other petitions open on the site about Southern Rail. You might like to sign one of those instead.
